section.p: Before you run the Horizon Plugin installer, make sure that you have made the required OpenStack Keystone preparations.
To install the Horizon Plugin, proceed as follows:

li.p: Log in to the OpenStack node on which the OpenStack Horizon service is installed.
Extract the CMM_client_2.0.0.zip archive file from the installation package to the installation directory. The archive provides the following files:
Change the access permission of the monasca-ui-1.5.1.run file to Execute.
Use the optional --target parameter to specify the directory in which to install the plugin. Example: /opt/monasca-ui.
If --target is not specified, it is installed in the current working directory.

section.p: The installer extracts the plugin with all the required dependencies. The configuration of the plugin and its dependencies is prepared.
